Title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Music
Writer: Ross Bagdasarian (characters), Janice Karman (characters), Randi Mayem Singer, Adam Sztykiel
Actors: Jason Lee, Justin Long, Matthew Gray Gubler, Jesse McCartney
Plot: The Chipmunks believe that Dave plans to propose to his new girlfriend in Miami.--and dump them. They have three days to get to him and save themselves not only from losing Dave but also from gaining a terrible stepbrother.
